001package com.deploygate.sdk;
002
003
004/**
005 * A callback interface to receive DeployGate events. Implement this and pass to
006 * {@link DeployGate#registerCallback(DeployGateCallback, boolean)} to listen.
007 *
008 * @author tnj
009 */
010public interface DeployGateCallback {
011    /**
012     * Callback to tell the finish of DeployGate service initialization
013     * procedure.
014     *
015     * @param isServiceAvailable
016     *         true if DeployGate service is available on the
017     *         device.
018     */
019    public void onInitialized(boolean isServiceAvailable);
020
021    /**
022     * Callback to tell the app status on the DeployGate has changed. This will
023     * also be called back just after {@link #onInitialized(boolean)},
024     * {@link DeployGate#refresh()} and
025     * {@link DeployGate#registerCallback(DeployGateCallback, boolean)} with
026     * true in second argument.
027     *
028     * @param isManaged
029     *         true if the app is known on DeployGate app
030     * @param isAuthorized
031     *         true if the app is on current user's installed list
032     * @param loginUsername
033     *         Current login username, returned only when
034     *         isAuthorized is true.
035     * @param isStopped
036     *         Reserved.
037     */
038    public void onStatusChanged(
039            boolean isManaged,
040            boolean isAuthorized,
041            String loginUsername,
042            boolean isStopped
043    );
044
045    /**
046     * Callback to tell the new version is available.
047     *
048     * @param revision
049     *         revision of new version
050     * @param versionName
051     *         user-defined version name of new version
052     * @param versionCode
053     *         user-defined version code of new version
054     */
055    public void onUpdateAvailable(
056            int revision,
057            String versionName,
058            int versionCode
059    );
060}
